fields.headline: Looking for updates? 'Sorry, publishing
fields.bodyText: Looking for updates? "Sorry, publishing is temporarily unavailable," says Blogger. "Blogger's servers are currently under too much load." Bud Tribble is going back to Apple. This won't mean much to most people, but Bud was one of the original Mac design team, left with Jobs to found NeXT, became chief software architect at Sun, and most recently worked for Linux start-up Eazel. I interviewed him in Online in June 1996. And if it were possible to find it at Guardian Unlimited, I'd even provide a link. (Remind me to ask our IT department what they did with the archives from the Online Web site we had before Guadian Unlimited started.....)
